Pabbedha，[pa+vedha of vyadh，cp．BSk．pravedha in same phrase at Divy 56，viz．ṣoḍaśa-pravedho] piercing through （measuring） an arrow shot Th．1，164 -- J．II，334 （soḷasa°=soḷasa-kaṇḍa-pāta-vitthāro C．）．-- Note．pabbedha owes its bb to analogy with ubbedha．It also corresponds to the latter in meaning：whereas ubbedha refers to the height，pabbedha is applied to the breadth or width．（Page 414）
